class.name: low_throughput_hmi/IntMap
class.description: Displays a map of float-point numbers, such as pdf on the ground plane from a low_thoughput_hmi/IntMap. Basede on Rviz Map plugin, modifed for Low thorughput HMI package by Dmitry Sinyukov

class.name: low_throughput_hmi/FloatMap
class.description: Displays a map of float-point numbers, such as pdf on the ground plane from a low_thoughput_hmi/FloatMap. Basede on Rviz Map plugin, modifed for Low thorughput HMI package by Dmitry Sinyukov
